meanings.definition: Not based on evidence or fact.
meanings.sent1: The conspiracy theory was completely unbased.
meanings.sent2: Her decision to quit her job was unbased and impulsive.
meanings.sent3: The idea of flying pigs is as unbased as it gets.
meanings.sent4: His argument was so unbased that it crumbled under scrutiny.
meanings.sent5: The unbased rumor spread like wildfire through the small town.

meanings.definition: Not supported by a foundation or basis.
meanings.sent1: The unbased theory lacked any solid proof.
meanings.sent2: The unbased accusations were quickly dismissed by the court.
meanings.sent3: The unbased claim that aliens built the pyramids made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: Her confidence was unbased, like a house of cards waiting to fall.
meanings.sent5: The unbased argument fell apart as soon as it was challenged.
